mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (name, icon, color, sort, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{icon}, #{color}, #{sort}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, icon = #{icon}, color = #{color}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, icon, color, sort, status FROM category ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT id, name, icon, color, sort, status FROM category WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY sort ASC
